name: vmwMemTable
description: Table of memory usage by virtual machine.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.1.name: vmwMemVMID
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.1.description: ID allocated to running vm by the vmkernel.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.2.name: vmwMemShares
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.2.description: Shares of memory allocated to vm by vmkernel.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.3.name: vmwMemConfigured
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.3.description: Amount of memory the vm was configured with. (KB)

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.4.name: vmwMemUtil
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.2.4.1.4.description: Amount of memory utilized by the vm. (KB; instantaneous)
